chinese: 嫌疑分子在审问之下招供了。

english: The hearing was adjourned for three weeks .
chinese: 这次审问延期三个星期再继续。

english: You will stay for the trial ?
chinese: 你愿意在审问期间留在这里吗？

english: Jones elected to conduct hanley's interrogation himself .
chinese: 琼斯决定亲自审问汉利。

english: The gentlemen who questioned us last night said so .
chinese: 昨晚审问我们的先生是这样说的。
审问造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: An english information was inquisitorial in nature .
chinese: 英格兰诉讼本质上是调查审问式的。
“这是什么？是在审问吗？”巴扎罗夫问道。

english: I don't know why they have to hold this trial in here .
chinese: 我不懂她们为什么要在这个地方举行审问。

english: The senate shall have the sole power to try all impeachments .
chinese: 所有弹劾案，只有参议院有权审问。

english: They're going to try alex morden here for murder .
chinese: 他们要在这个地方把亚历克斯莫顿当杀人犯来审问。

english: The police detained the suspected thief for further questioning .
chinese: 警方收押了盗窃嫌疑犯以作进一步审问。

english: The police detained the suspected thief for further questioning .
chinese: 警方羁留了盗窃嫌疑犯以作进一步审问。

english: The police detained the suspected thief for further questioning .
chinese: 警方拘留了盗窃嫌疑犯以作进一步审问。

english: Heresy, gentlemen, heresy is the charge we have to try .
chinese: 异端哪，先生们，异端这才是咱们要审问的罪名。
